dark:border-stone-800"}],["$","$L6","7",{"delay":0.35000000000000003,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 text-lg","children":"香炉峰在阳光的照射下生起紫色烟霞，远远望见瀑布似白色绢绸悬挂在山前。"}],["$","p","9",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"高崖上飞腾直落的瀑布好像有几千尺，让人恍惚以为银河从天上泻落到人间。"}],["$","hr","10",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}],["$","$L6","11",{"delay":0.55,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 9:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗形象地描绘了庐山瀑布雄奇壮丽的景色，反映了诗人对祖国大好河山的无限热爱。"}]
a:["$","p","13",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"首句\"日照香炉生紫烟\"，\"香炉\"是指庐山的香炉峰。此峰在庐山西北，形状尖圆，像座香炉。由于瀑布飞泻，水气蒸腾而上，在丽日照耀下，仿佛有座顶天立地的香炉冉冉升起了团团紫烟。一个\"生\"字把烟云冉冉上升的景象写活了。"}]
b:["$","p","14",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"次句\"遥看瀑布挂前川\"，\"遥看瀑布\"四字照应了题目《望庐山瀑布》。\"挂前川\"是说瀑布像一条巨大的白练从悬崖直挂到前面的河流上。\"挂\"字化动为静，维纱维肖地写出遥望中的瀑布。"}]
c:["$","p","15",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"诗的前两句从大处着笔，概写望中全景：山顶紫烟缭绕，山间白练悬挂，山下激流奔腾，构成了一幅绚丽壮美的图景。"}]
d:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"第三句\"飞流直下三千尺\"是从近处细致地描写瀑布。\"飞流\"表现瀑布凌空而出，喷涌飞泻。\"直下\"既写出岩壁的陡峭，又写出水流之急。\"三千尺\"极力夸张，写山的高峻。"}]
e:["$","p","17",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这样写诗人觉得还没把瀑布的雄奇气势表现得淋漓尽致，于是接着又写上一句\"疑是银河落九天\"。说这\"飞流直下\"的瀑布，使人怀疑是银河从九天倾泻下来。一个\"疑\"字，用得空灵活泼，若真若幻，引人遐想，增添了瀑布的神奇色彩。"}]
f:["$","p","18",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗运用极其夸张的浪漫主义创作手法，形象地描绘了庐山瀑布雄奇壮丽的景色，反映了诗人对祖国大好河山的无限热爱。"}]
10:["$","hr","19",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
11:["$","div","20",{"className":"mt-10 pt-6 border-t border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800","children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"text-sm font-medium text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 mb-3","children":"标签"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"山水"}],["$","span","1",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"瀑布"}],["$","span","2",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"夸张"}],["$","span","3",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"浪漫主义"}],["$","span","4",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"唐代"}]]}]]}]
12:["$","$L6",null,{"delay":0.2,"children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-8 flex justify-between items-center","children":[["$","$L2",null,{"href":"/#唐代","className":"inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 hover:text-stone-900 dark:hover:text-stone-200 transition-colors","children":[["$","svg",null,{"className":"w-5 h-5","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","viewBox":"0 0 24 24","children":["$","path",null,{"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","strokeWidth":2,"d":"M19 11H7.83l5.59-5.59L12 4l-8 8 8 8 1.41-1.41L7.83 13H19v-2z"}]}],"返回","唐代"]}],["$","$L17",null,{"title":"望庐山瀑布","author":"李白","dynasty":"唐代","poemLines":["日照香炉生紫烟","遥看瀑布挂前川","飞流直下三千尺","疑是银河落九天"],"tags":["山水","瀑布","夸张","浪漫主义","唐代"]}]]}]}]
